about_the_game:
Step into the dark and twisted world of Feigning Innocence, where you take on the role of Nathon Dean, a seasoned detective with a penchant for unraveling the most chilling of mysteries. Recent reports have sent shockwaves through the quiet town of Eldermoor – over 20 individuals have vanished without a trace, dragging dark secrets into the light.

As Nathon Dean, you follow a lead that directs you to the ominous Blackthorn Castle, a sprawling fortress looming on the edge of town. The air is thick with tension as you pull up to the foreboding gates only to find your partner's car abandoned in the gravel driveway. A sense of dread washes over you as you realize it's not just the missing persons you must find, but your partner as well.

Venture into the castle’s shadowy depths, where echoes of the past linger and every corner hides unsettling secrets. As you explore the grand but decaying halls, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover clues, you will encounter bizarre creatures and sinister occurrences that challenge your sanity and test your resolve.

Will you be able to piece together the mystery of the missing townsfolk? What horrors lie within the castle walls, and can you rescue your partner before it’s too late? Navigate a web of deception, face your deepest fears, and uncover the truth in Feigning Innocence. The investigation begins now, but remember—some doors are better left closed.

Key Features:

  • Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative filled with twists, turns, and psychological horror.

  • Solve challenging puzzles and gather crucial evidence to aid your investigation.

  • Explore the eerie atmosphere of Blackthorn Castle, each room holding its own dark secrets.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of violence, dead bodies, blood, demonic presence, illusions, and sense of impending doom.

name: Feigning Innocence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Feigning Innocence is a Linear Horror game where you will Explore the ominous Blackthorn Castle, uncover dark secrets, solve intricate puzzles, and confront horrifying creatures. Will you find your partner and unravel the truth, or become another lost soul?
